item.description:
***Copied and pasted from last meetup with 1 hour early***

We will meet at the tennis courts in the Boston Common at 10:00am. The tennis courts are at the corner of Tremont and Boylston street....close to the AMC theater on Tremont street. If you can't make it by 10:15 to the tennis courts please look for us (volleyball net) along the side of the Boston Common on Tremont street between Park Street T-stop and Boylston T-stop.
item.name: The Boston 2s Beach/Grass Volleyball Meetup
